fabric_analysis.fabric_thick_summary: The dress is made from rib-knitted wool, which is generally a thicker, warmer fabric. The ribbing adds extra texture and density, making both the bodice and skirt suitable for cooler weather.
fabric_analysis.fabric_light_colored_summary: The fabric is a dark gray m√©lange, not light colored or patterned.
fabric_analysis.fabric_shiny_summary: The rib-knitted wool fabric has a matte finish, not shiny.
fabric_analysis.fabric_stretchy_summary: Rib-knitted wool is naturally stretchy and flexible.
fabric_analysis.fabric_ribbed_summary: The fabric is clearly rib-knitted, giving it a ribbed texture.
fabric_analysis.fabric_wrinkles_summary: Rib-knitted wool is naturally resistant to wrinkling.
fabric_analysis.fabric_sheer_summary: Thick rib-knitted wool is opaque and not see-through.
fabric_analysis.fabric_retains_odor_summary: Wool is naturally odor-resistant and does not retain odor easily.

flare_analysis.flare_under_bust_summary: The dress is fitted under the bust and only flares out below the hips.
flare_analysis.flare_above_waist_summary: The dress is fitted above the waist and only flares out below the hips.
flare_analysis.flare_waist_summary: The dress is fitted at the waist and does not flare until below the hips.
flare_analysis.flare_high_hip_summary: The dress remains fitted at the high hip and starts to flare lower down.
flare_analysis.flare_low_hip_summary: The dress begins to flare out at the low hip area.
flare_analysis.flare_knee_summary: The dress flares out starting from around the knee area.
flare_analysis.tight_above_knee_summary: The dress is fitted above the knee and flares out at the knee.

waist_analysis.waist_tight_summary: The dress appears to have a fitted waist, as the fabric narrows significantly at the waist area, suggesting a tight fit.
waist_analysis.waist_fitted_summary: The waist is visibly contoured and shaped.
waist_analysis.waist_flare_summary: The flare starts below the waist, not at the waist.
waist_analysis.waist_loose_summary: The waist appears to be closely fitted.

skirt_analysis.skirt_ankle_summary: The skirt length falls above the ankle, closer to mid-calf.
skirt_analysis.skirt_floor_summary: The skirt length stops above the floor, around the lower calf or ankle.
skirt_analysis.skirt_mid_calf_summary: The skirt length clearly extends past the mid-calf area.
skirt_analysis.skirt_mid_calf_tight_summary: The skirt is loose and flares out around the mid-calf area.
skirt_analysis.skirt_mid_calf_slits_summary: The skirt does not have any visible slits or buttons in the mid calf area.
skirt_analysis.skirt_mid_calf_buttons_summary: There are no buttons visible around the mid calf area of the skirt.
skirt_analysis.skirt_knee_summary: The skirt length clearly extends well past the knee area.
skirt_analysis.skirt_knee_tight_summary: The skirt is loose and does not fit tightly around the knee area.
skirt_analysis.skirt_knee_slits_summary: There are no slits or buttons visible in the knee area of the skirt.
skirt_analysis.skirt_knee_buttons_summary: There are no buttons visible around the knee area of the skirt.
skirt_analysis.skirt_tea_summary: The skirt length reaches the tea length area, which is mid-calf to just above the ankle.
skirt_analysis.skirt_tea_tight_summary: The skirt is loose and flared around the tea area.
skirt_analysis.skirt_tea_slits_summary: There are no slits or buttons visible in the tea area of the skirt.
skirt_analysis.skirt_tea_buttons_summary: There are no buttons visible around the tea area of the skirt.
skirt_analysis.skirt_mid_thigh_summary: The skirt length extends well past the mid thigh area.
skirt_analysis.skirt_mid_thigh_tight_summary: The skirt is fitted and appears tight around the mid thigh area.
skirt_analysis.skirt_mid_thigh_slits_summary: There are no slits or buttons visible in the mid thigh area of the skirt.
skirt_analysis.skirt_mid_thigh_buttons_summary: There are no buttons visible around the mid thigh area of the skirt.
skirt_analysis.skirt_high_thigh_summary: The skirt length extends well past the high thigh area.
skirt_analysis.skirt_high_thigh_tight_summary: The skirt is fitted and appears tight around the high thigh area.
skirt_analysis.skirt_high_thigh_slits_summary: There are no slits or buttons visible in the high thigh area of the skirt.
skirt_analysis.skirt_high_thigh_buttons_summary: There are no buttons visible around the high thigh area of the skirt.

bodice_analysis.Empire waist_summary: The dress does not have an empire waist; the waistline is not raised above the natural waist, but rather follows the natural waistline.
bodice_analysis.Tight_summary: The bodice appears fitted and form-hugging, as indicated by the ribbed knit material and the way it is shaped.
bodice_analysis.Built-in Chest Support_summary: There is no visible indication of built-in support in the chest area; the dress appears to be a simple ribbed knit design.
bodice_analysis.Buttons, Panels, darts or ruching_summar: The bodice is smooth and seamless with no visible buttons, panels, darts, or ruching.

back_analysis.Back Type_summary: The back of the dress is fully covered with no openings, cutouts, or racerback design.
back_analysis.Buttons_summary: The back of the dress is smooth and does not show any buttons.
back_analysis.Zippers_summary: There are no visible zippers on the back of the dress.

one_shoulder_analysis.One_Shoulder_summary: The dress has long sleeves on both sides and a turtleneck, not a one-shoulder design.

sleeves_analysis.Armholes are high-set / close to the sho: shoulder seam is dropped below the shoulder
The sleeves appear to start lower than the natural shoulder line, indicating a dropped shoulder seam construction.
sleeves_analysis.Strapless_summary: The dress has long sleeves and a turtleneck, which means it is not strapless.
sleeves_analysis.Sleeveless_summary: The dress has long sleeves, so it is not sleeveless.
sleeves_analysis.T-shirt_summary: The dress has long sleeves, not the short sleeves typical of T-shirt designs.
sleeves_analysis.Cap_summary: The dress has long sleeves, not the short, rounded cap sleeves.
sleeves_analysis.Mid_summary: The dress has full-length sleeves, not mid-length sleeves.
sleeves_analysis.Long_summary: The dress clearly has full-length sleeves that extend to the wrists.
sleeves_analysis.Puffy-Long_summary: The sleeves are fitted and not puffy.

neckline_analysis.high-mid-low_summary: The dress features a turtleneck, which sits high on the chest and covers the neck.
neckline_analysis.Neckline Type_summary: The dress has a high, close-fitting neckline that covers the neck, characteristic of a turtleneck design.

hemline_analysis.Hemline_summary: The hemline of the dress is slightly flared and wavy, which does not fit the straight, high/low, or asymmetric categories.
